abstract: French Blockade Min backs Brit position on search of U S and neutral mail
snippet: PARIS, Feb. 2 (AP)--The French Blockade Ministry today backed up Britain's claim that the Allies are within their rights in examining United States and other neutral mails and asserted that the procedure had blocked an organized......

headline.main: PARIS BACKS RIGHT TO SEARCH MAILS; Blockade Ministry Supports British Contention That Allies Act Legally

lead_paragraph: PARIS, Feb. 2 (AP)--The French Blockade Ministry today backed up Britain's claim that the Allies are within their rights in examining United States and other neutral mails and asserted that the procedure had blocked an organized...
